description:
Shouken manages to save Tanmoku Ki from captivity from the former head, but the former head`s son spins a story of lies to paint Shouken`s actions in a bad light and gets him in trouble. The situation is further complicated when Shouken`s room is searched and they find that Shouken has been hiding some of Ki`s hair. With Shouken behind bars, Ki desperately refuses to believe that his trusted bodyguard and companion would betray him and helps him escape. The final piece of Ki`s nightmare falls into place for Keika.
Source: crunchyroll
